answer: Right next to your name on the top left sidebar you will find a default avatar picture 🏞 . Click on that avatar to edit your profile! ⚙️
answer_formatted: Right next to your name on the top left sidebar you will find a default avatar picture 🏞 . Click on that avatar to edit your profile! ⚙️
